thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 20 of 288
thread.title: Tina

author: Tina
title: Tina
text: The recipes are easy enough that my husband even made dinner one night for us! And he NEVER cooks anything more than a classic breakfast! I enjoy the variety of meals we get. Some are better than others, but we love trying new recipes. The packaging is not outrageous either which is a bonus. When I have any issues, the team is always responsive and makes sure I'm satisfied.
